statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_management;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, min_stock, max_stock FROM inventory_management ORDER BY min_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity > min_stock ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, timestamp FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity < max_stock ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE min_stock < max_stock ORDER BY quantity DESC, product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, timestamp FROM inventory_management WHERE min_stock = max_stock ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE item_quantity > 0;
SELECT order_id, item_id, quantity_ordered FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE item_quantity < 10 ORDER BY item_quantity ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity_ordered FROM orders WHERE quantity_ordered > 5 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE item_quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, item_name, order_date FROM orders INNER JOIN inventory_items ON orders.item_id = inventory_items.item_id WHERE quantity_ordered > 50 ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity_ordered) AS total_ordered FROM inventory_items JOIN orders ON inventory_items.item_id = orders.item_id GROUP BY item_name HAVING total_ordered > 100;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE item_quantity < 50 ORDER BY item_quantity ASC, item_name;
SELECT order_id, order_date, item_name, quantity_ordered FROM orders JOIN inventory_items ON orders.item_id = inventory_items.item_id WHERE quantity_ordered < 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < min_stock_level;
SELECT item_name, max_stock_level FROM Inventory ORDER BY max_stock_level DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE item_id = 3;
SELECT item_name, reason FROM Overstock JOIN Inventory ON Overstock.item_id = Inventory.item_id;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < min_stock_level ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Stockouts WHERE reason = 'Damaged' ORDER BY stockout_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, min_stock_level, max_stock_level FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < min_stock_level OR quantity > max_stock_level;
SELECT item_name, quantity, reason FROM Inventory INNER JOIN Overstock ON Inventory.item_id = Overstock.item_id ORDER BY overstock_date ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, overstock_date FROM Inventory INNER JOIN Overstock ON Inventory.item_id = Overstock.item_id WHERE quantity > max_stock_level ORDER BY overstock_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, min_stock_level, max_stock_level FROM Inventory
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_person, email, phone_number FROM Suppliers
SELECT purchase_id, product_id, supplier_id, purchase_date, quantity, price FROM Purchases
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, quantity, price FROM Sales
SELECT * FROM Inventory
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM Inventory WHERE stock_level < min_stock_level;
SELECT Suppliers.supplier_name, Purchases.purchase_date, Purchases.quantity FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Purchases ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Purchases.supplier_id;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM Inventory INNER JOIN Sales ON Inventory.product_id = Sales.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE price > (SELECT AVG(price) FROM Inventory);
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock < 50 AND category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, address, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, reorder_level FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock <= reorder_level ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
